name: v1.65.2
body: Version 1.65.2

name: v1.65.1
body: Version 1.65.1
tag

name: Version 1.62
body:
* Discard packets by src IP with new flag -disip. Thanks for the contribution @sincejune
* Allow tcp configurable retries with new flag -tcpsendretries. Thanks for the contribution @atanasdb
* Better correlation of sip and rtcp. Thanks for the contribution @xhantu

name: Version 1.56
body:
* Add version flag
* Dont send out unknown HEP packets
* Not fully static build

name: Version 1.55
body:
* sctp support
* better readable file output
* again a fully static build

name: Version 1.54
body: * Don't decode ng control protocol

name: Version 1.53
body: * Add vxlan support

name: Version 1.52
body:
* Allow multiple output server
* Some performance improvements
* Allow NPcap on windows
* Decode ERSPAN Type II & III
* Websocket support

name: Version 1.47
body:
* Add BenchmarkParseRTCP
* Remove hex package
* Add vlan header for af_packet
* Fix windows building
* Fix SDP rtcp attribute correlation
* Fix bug inside ParseRTCP found by fuzzer

name: Version 1.46
body: * Fix index out of range in rtcp.go

name: Version 1.45
body:
* Use atomic counters
* Trim space around Call-ID
* Fix for i386 alignment
* Correlate inverse RTCP flow too

name: Version 1.4
body:
* Improve decoding speed by ~15%
* Add basic tcpassembly with flag -tcpassembly
* Add IPv6 UDP defragmenter
* Allow multiple comma seperated filter and discard strings

name: Version 1.3
body:
* Add -sl flag for syslog output
* Fix Call-ID index for BroadWorks
* Change -dd flag default to false
* Allow vlan and erspan filter in combination

name: Version 1.2
body: * Add -dim flag to drop comma separated SIP methods (-dim OPTIONS,NOTIFY)

name: Version 1.1
body:
* Improve performance by 10-15%
* Add -nt flag [udp, tcp, tls] (default "udp")

name: Version 1.0
body:
* Correlate rtpengine ng protocol qos stats
* Parse rtpengine callid
* Capture tcp logs
* Decode Cisco's ERSPAN

name: Version 0.98
body:
* Add nsq output
* Add hep tls output
* Add go specific benchmark
* Improve RTCP handling
* Little improvements here and there

name: Version 0.96
body:
* Add rtp to pcap output
* Add IPv6 support

name: Version 0.95
body:
* Add new flags to write pcap files (-wf, -rt -zf)
* Add nodeID flag (-hi)

name: Version 0.9
body:
* Better LinkTypeLinuxSLL + VLAN handling
* Add i386 binary

name: Version 0.85
body:
*Add more debug selectors:
  ./heplify -i any -t af_packet -m SIPRTCP -e -d layers,payload,sdp,rtcp,rtcpfail
*Improve RTCP correlation
* Add windows binary

name: Version 0.80
body:
* A whole lot simpler LRU cache
* SIP -> RTCP correlation
* Specify SIP port range
* Simplify pcap read in
* Apply BPF filter for pcap read file
* Make binary file completly static
